text:
October 24, 1957
Professor Francisco de Paula, Jor.
R. Visconde de Pamaiba, 685c 14 (Bras)
San Paulo - Capital - Brazil
SOUTH AMERICA
Dear Professor de Paula:
Thank you very much for your letter of September 20 regarding our NAEB TV
Research Fact Sheets. These bulletins are issued at irregular intervals as a
continuing series and are an effort to digest and centralize available research
principally on the effectiveness of radio and television as instructional tools.
The cost of these Fact Sheets of $4.00 per year.
A Fact Sheet subscription runs from January of one year to January of the next
year. Therefore, if you subscribe now, you will receive all those Fact Sheets
which have been issued since January 1957 and your subscription will expire
in January 1958. We also have available all the Fact Sheets printed in 1955
and 1956. If you desire to purchase these, the price is $2.50 per year or a
total of $5.00 for both 1955 and 1956.
I am enclosing a sample Fact Sheet for your information and also a listing of
all of our publications and recording which are available to you. If you wish
to subscribe to the Fact Sheets or wish to purchase any of our materials, please
let us know.
Thank you again for your interest.
Sincerely,
Enclosures (2)
(Mrs.) Judith B. Gans
Secretary
